translation.value: Oops! Something went wrong - the 'Real Time' mod could not be activated. Please share your game log file with the mod's developer.
The time when most citizens start waking up. The budgets and the time speed switch to the 'day' mode!
The time when most citizens start going to sleep. The budgets and the time speed switch to the 'night' mode!
The speed of the time flow on daytime. '1' is very slow - almost real time!
The speed of the time flow on night time. '1' is very slow - almost real time!
Day length depends on the map's theme and day of the year. In winter the days are shorter than in summer.
Select 'All' for a real city (but max 65.535 citizens), select 'Vanilla' or 'More' if your PC is weak
Cims don't go to work or school on weekends
Cims should go out at lunch for food
Pause the building construction and upgrade at night time
The construction site workers need to sleep too
The percentage of the citizens that work second shift
The percentage of the citizens that work night shift
The percentage of the Cims that will go out for lunch
The percentage of the population that will search for local shopping
The percentage of the Cims that will go to and leave their work on time
The earliest time when an event can start on a weekday
The latest time when an event can start on a weekday
The earliest time when an event can start on a weekend day
The latest time when an event can start on a weekend day
The maximum overtime for the Cims - they come to work earlier or stay at work longer
The school start daytime hour - the young Cims must be at school
The daytime hour when the young Cims return from school
The work start daytime hour - the adult Cims must be at work or university
The daytime hour when the adult Cims return from work or university
The daytime hour when the Cims go out for lunch
The daytime hour when the Cims return from lunch back to work
